Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion

Class SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U extends Expansion<T,​S>>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.Expandable<T,​S,​U,​SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U>>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the object that refines the expandable's behaviour
S - The type of the supported expansions' marker
U - The type of supported expansions
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccumulatorExpandable, ExpConsumer
public abstract class SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U extends Expansion<T,​S>>
extends Expandable<T,​S,​U,​SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U>>
Brief Represents a simple expandable implementation. Simple means that expansions are not treated different based on their ExpansionType. They are all stored in the unique same list when added
